name: deerling
texts: The color and scent of their fur changes to match the mountain grass. When they sense hostility, they hide in the grass.

name: sawsbuck
texts: They migrate according to the seasons. People can tell the season by looking at Sawsbuck’s horns.

name: emolga
texts: The energy made in its cheeks’ electric pouches is stored inside its membrane and released while it is gliding.

name: karrablast
texts: These mysterious Pokémon evolve when they receive electrical stimulation while they are in the same place as Shelmet.

name: escavalier
texts: They fly around at high speed, striking with their pointed spears. Even when in trouble, they face opponents bravely.

name: foongus
texts: It lures people in with its Poké Ball pattern, then releases poison spores. Why it resembles a Poké Ball is unknown.

name: amoonguss
texts: It lures prey close by dancing and waving its arm caps, which resemble Poké Balls, in a swaying motion.

name: frillish
texts: With its thin, veil-like arms wrapped around the body of its opponent, it sinks to the ocean floor.

name: jellicent
texts: The fate of the ships and crew that wander into Jellicent’s habitat: all sunken, all lost, all vanished.

name: alomomola
texts: The special membrane enveloping Alomomola has the ability to heal wounds.

name: joltik
texts: Joltik that live in cities have learned a technique for sucking electricity from the outlets in houses.

name: galvantula
texts: When attacked, they create an electric barrier by spitting out many electrically charged threads.

name: ferroseed
texts: When threatened, it attacks by shooting a barrage of spikes, which gives it a chance to escape by rolling away.

name: ferrothorn
texts: It fights by swinging around its three spiky feelers. A hit from these steel spikes can reduce a boulder to rubble.

name: klink
texts: The two minigears that mesh together are predetermined. Each will rebound from other minigears without meshing.

name: klang
texts: By changing the direction in which it rotates, it communicates its feelings to others. When angry, it rotates faster.

name: klinklang
texts: The gear with the red core is rotated at high speed for a rapid energy charge.

name: tynamo
texts: While one alone doesn’t have much power, a chain of many Tynamo can be as powerful as lightning.

name: eelektrik
texts: They coil around foes and shock them with electricity-generating organs that seem simply to be circular patterns.

name: eelektross
texts: They crawl out of the ocean using their arms. They will attack prey on shore and immediately drag it into the ocean.

name: elgyem
texts: It uses its strong psychic power to squeeze its opponent’s brain, causing unendurable headaches.

name: beheeyem
texts: It can manipulate an opponent’s memory. Apparently, it communicates by flashing its three different-colored fingers.

name: litwick
texts: Litwick shines a light that absorbs the life energy of people and Pokémon, which becomes the fuel that it burns.

name: lampent
texts: This ominous Pokémon is feared. Through cities it wanders, searching for the spirits of the fallen.

name: chandelure
texts: It absorbs a spirit, which it then burns. By waving the flames on its arms, it puts its foes into a hypnotic trance.

name: axew
texts: They use their tusks to crush the berries they eat. Repeated regrowth makes their tusks strong and sharp.

name: fraxure
texts: Since a broken tusk will not grow back, they diligently sharpen their tusks on river rocks after they’ve been fighting.

name: haxorus
texts: They are kind but can be relentless when defending territory. They challenge foes with tusks that can cut steel.

name: cubchoo
texts: When it is not feeling well, its mucus gets watery and the power of its Ice-type moves decreases.

name: beartic
texts: It can make its breath freeze at will. Very able in the water, it swims around in northern seas and catches prey.

name: cryogonal
texts: When its body temperature goes up, it turns into steam and vanishes. When its temperature lowers, it returns to ice.

name: shelmet
texts: When attacked, it defends itself by closing the lid of its shell. It can spit a sticky, poisonous liquid.

name: accelgor
texts: When its body dries out, it weakens. So, to prevent dehydration, it wraps itself in many layers of thin membrane.

name: stunfisk
texts: Its skin is very hard, so it is unhurt even if stepped on by sumo wrestlers. It smiles when transmitting electricity.

name: mienfoo
texts: In fights, they dominate with onslaughts of flowing, continuous attacks. With their sharp claws, they cut enemies.

name: mienshao
texts: It wields the fur on its arms like a whip. Its arm attacks come with such rapidity that they cannot even be seen.

name: druddigon
texts: It warms its body by absorbing sunlight with its wings. When its body temperature falls, it can no longer move.

name: golett
texts: The energy that burns inside it enables it to move, but no one has yet been able to identify this energy.

name: golurk
texts: It flies across the sky at Mach speeds. Removing the seal on its chest makes its internal energy go out of control.

name: pawniard
texts: Blades comprise this Pokémon’s entire body. If battling dulls the blades, it sharpens them on stones by the river.

name: bisharp
texts: It leads a group of Pawniard. It battles to become the boss, but will be driven from the group if it loses.

name: bouffalant
texts: Their fluffy fur absorbs damage, even if they strike foes with a fierce headbutt.

name: rufflet
texts: They crush berries with their talons. They bravely stand up to any opponent, no matter how strong it is.

name: braviary
texts: They fight for their friends without any thought about danger to themselves. One can carry a car while flying.

name: vullaby
texts: Their wings are too tiny to allow them to fly. They guard their posteriors with bones that were gathered by Mandibuzz.

name: mandibuzz
texts: It makes a nest out of bones it finds. It grabs weakened prey in its talons and hauls it to its nest of bones.

name: heatmor
texts: It breathes through a hole in its tail while it burns with an internal fire. Durant is its prey.

name: durant
texts: They attack in groups, covering themselves in steel armor to protect themselves from Heatmor.

name: deino
texts: It tends to bite everything, and it is not a picky eater. Approaching it carelessly is dangerous.

name: zweilous
texts: After it has eaten up all the food in its territory, it moves to another area. Its two heads do not get along.

name: hydreigon
texts: This brutal Pokémon travels the skies on its six wings. Anything that moves seems like a foe to it, triggering its attack.

name: larvesta
texts: This Pokémon was believed to have been born from the sun. When it evolves, its entire body is engulfed in flames.

name: volcarona
texts: When volcanic ash darkened the atmosphere, it is said that Volcarona’s fire provided a replacement for the sun.

name: cobalion
texts: This legendary Pokémon battled against humans to protect Pokémon. Its personality is calm and composed.

name: terrakion
texts: This Pokémon came to the defense of Pokémon that had lost their homes in a war among humans.

name: virizion
texts: This Pokémon fought humans in order to protect its friends. Legends about it continue to be passed down.

name: tornadus-incarnate
texts: The lower half of its body is wrapped in a cloud of energy. It zooms through the sky at 200 mph.

name: thundurus-incarnate
texts: Countless charred remains mar the landscape of places through which Thundurus has passed.

name: reshiram
texts: This Pokémon appears in legends. It sends flames into the air from its tail, burning up everything around it.

name: zekrom
texts: Concealing itself in lightning clouds, it flies throughout the Unova region. It creates electricity in its tail.

name: landorus-incarnate
texts: Lands visited by Landorus grant such bountiful crops that it has been hailed as “The Guardian of the Fields.”

name: kyurem
texts: It generates a powerful, freezing energy inside itself, but its body became frozen when the energy leaked out.

name: keldeo-ordinary
texts: By blasting water from its hooves, it can glide across water. It excels at using leg moves while battling.

name: meloetta-aria
texts: Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization method that can control the feelings of those who hear it.

name: genesect
texts: Over 300 million years ago, it was feared as the strongest of hunters. It has been modified by Team Plasma.

name: chespin
texts: The quills on its head are usually soft. When it flexes them, the points become so hard and sharp that they can pierce rock.

name: quilladin
texts: It relies on its sturdy shell to deflect predators’ attacks. It counterattacks with its sharp quills.

name: chesnaught
texts: Its Tackle is forceful enough to flip a 50-ton tank. It shields its allies from danger with its own body.

name: fennekin
texts: Eating a twig fills it with energy, and its roomy ears give vent to air hotter than 390 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: braixen
texts: It has a twig stuck in its tail. With friction from its tail fur, it sets the twig on fire and launches into battle.

name: delphox
texts: It gazes into the flame at the tip of its branch to achieve a focused state, which allows it to see into the future.

name: froakie
texts: It secretes flexible bubbles from its chest and back. The bubbles reduce the damage it would otherwise take when attacked.

name: frogadier
texts: It can throw bubble-covered pebbles with precise control, hitting empty cans up to a hundred feet away.

name: greninja
texts: It creates throwing stars out of compressed water. When it spins them and throws them at high speed, these stars can split metal in two.

name: bunnelby
texts: They use their large ears to dig burrows. They will dig the whole night through.

name: diggersby
texts: With their powerful ears, they can heft boulders of a ton or more with ease. They can be a big help at construction sites.

name: fletchling
texts: These friendly Pokémon send signals to one another with beautiful chirps and tail-feather movements.

name: fletchinder
texts: From its beak, it expels embers that set the tall grass on fire. Then it pounces on the bewildered prey that pop out of the grass.

name: talonflame
texts: In the fever of an exciting battle, it showers embers from the gaps between its feathers and takes to the air.

name: scatterbug
texts: When under attack from bird Pokémon, it spews a poisonous black powder that causes paralysis on contact.

name: spewpa
texts: It lives hidden within thicket shadows. When predators attack, it quickly bristles the fur covering its body in an effort to threaten them.

name: vivillon
texts: Vivillon with many different patterns are found all over the world. These patterns are affected by the climate of their habitat.

name: litleo
texts: The stronger the opponent it faces, the more heat surges from its mane and the more power flows through its body.

name: pyroar
texts: The male with the largest mane of fire is the leader of the pride.

name: flabebe
texts: It draws out and controls the hidden power of flowers. The flower Flabébé holds is most likely part of its body.

name: floette
texts: It flutters around fields of flowers and cares for flowers that are starting to wilt. It draws out the hidden power of flowers to battle.

name: florges
texts: It claims exquisite flower gardens as its territory, and it obtains power from basking in the energy emitted by flowering plants.

name: skiddo
texts: Thought to be one of the first Pokémon to live in harmony with humans, it has a placid disposition.

name: gogoat
texts: It can tell how its Trainer is feeling by subtle shifts in the grip on its horns. This empathic sense lets them run as if one being.

name: pancham
texts: It does its best to be taken seriously by its enemies, but its glare is not sufficiently intimidating. Chewing on a leaf is its trademark.

name: pangoro
texts: Although it possesses a violent temperament, it won’t put up with bullying. It uses the leaf in its mouth to sense the movements of its enemies.

name: furfrou
texts: Trimming its fluffy fur not only makes it more elegant but also increases the swiftness of its movements.

name: espurr
texts: The organ that emits its intense psychic power is sheltered by its ears to keep power from leaking out.

name: meowstic-male
texts: When in danger, it raises its ears and releases enough psychic power to grind a 10-ton truck into dust.

name: honedge
texts: Apparently this Pokémon is born when a departed spirit inhabits a sword. It attaches itself to people and drinks their life force.

name: doublade
texts: When Honedge evolves, it divides into two swords, which cooperate via telepathy to coordinate attacks and slash their enemies to ribbons.

name: aegislash-shield
texts: Generations of kings were attended by these Pokémon, which used their spectral power to manipulate and control people and Pokémon.

name: spritzee
texts: It emits a scent that enraptures those who smell it. This fragrance changes depending on what it has eaten.

name: aromatisse
texts: It devises various scents, pleasant and unpleasant, and emits scents that its enemies dislike in order to gain an edge in battle.

name: swirlix
texts: To entangle its opponents in battle, it extrudes white threads as sweet and sticky as cotton candy.

name: slurpuff
texts: It can distinguish the faintest of scents. It puts its sensitive sense of smell to use by helping pastry chefs in their work.

name: inkay
texts: Opponents who stare at the flashing of the light-emitting spots on its body become dazed and lose their will to fight.

name: malamar
texts: It wields the most compelling hypnotic powers of any Pokémon, and it forces others to do whatever it wants.

name: binacle
texts: Two Binacle live together on one rock. When they fight, one of them will move to a different rock.

name: barbaracle
texts: When they evolve, two Binacle multiply into seven. They fight with the power of seven Binacle.

name: skrelp
texts: Camouflaged as rotten kelp, they spray liquid poison on prey that approaches unawares and then finish it off.

name: dragalge
texts: Their poison is strong enough to eat through the hull of a tanker, and they spit it indiscriminately at anything that enters their territory.

name: clauncher
texts: They knock down flying prey by firing compressed water from their massive claws like shooting a pistol.

name: clawitzer
texts: Their enormous claws launch cannonballs of water powerful enough to pierce tanker hulls.

name: helioptile
texts: They make their home in deserts. They can generate their energy from basking in the sun, so eating food is not a requirement.

name: heliolisk
texts: They flare their frills and generate energy. A single Heliolisk can generate sufficient electricity to power a skyscraper.

name: tyrunt
texts: This Pokémon was restored from a fossil. If something happens that it doesn’t like, it throws a tantrum and runs wild.

name: tyrantrum
texts: Thanks to its gargantuan jaws, which could shred thick metal plates as if they were paper, it was invincible in the ancient world it once inhabited.

name: amaura
texts: This ancient Pokémon was restored from part of its body that had been frozen in ice for over 100 million years.

name: aurorus
texts: The diamond-shaped crystals on its body expel air as cold as -240 degrees Fahrenheit, surrounding its enemies and encasing them in ice.

name: sylveon
texts: It sends a soothing aura from its ribbonlike feelers to calm fights.

name: hawlucha
texts: Although its body is small, its proficient fighting skills enable it to keep up with big bruisers like Machamp and Hariyama.

name: dedenne
texts: Its whiskers serve as antennas. By sending and receiving electrical waves, it can communicate with others over vast distances.

name: carbink
texts: Born from the temperatures and pressures deep underground, it fires beams from the stone in its head.

name: goomy
texts: The weakest Dragon-type Pokémon, it lives in damp, shady places, so its body doesn’t dry out.

name: sliggoo
texts: It drives away opponents by excreting a sticky liquid that can dissolve anything. Its eyes devolved, so it can’t see anything.

name: goodra
texts: This very friendly Dragon-type Pokémon will hug its beloved Trainer, leaving that Trainer covered in sticky slime.

name: klefki
texts: These key collectors threaten any attackers by fiercely jingling their keys at them.

name: phantump
texts: These Pokémon are created when spirits possess rotten tree stumps. They prefer to live in abandoned forests.

name: trevenant
texts: It can control trees at will. It will trap people who harm the forest, so they can never leave.

name: pumpkaboo-average
texts: The pumpkin body is inhabited by a spirit trapped in this world. As the sun sets, it becomes restless and active.

name: gourgeist-average
texts: Singing in eerie voices, they wander town streets on the night of the new moon. Anyone who hears their song is cursed.

name: bergmite
texts: It blocks opponents’ attacks with the ice that shields its body. It uses cold air to repair any cracks with new ice.

name: avalugg
texts: Its ice-covered body is as hard as steel. Its cumbersome frame crushes anything that stands in its way.

name: noibat
texts: They live in pitch-black caves. Their enormous ears can emit ultrasonic waves of 200,000 hertz.

name: noivern
texts: They fly around on moonless nights and attack careless prey. Nothing can beat them in a battle in the dark.

name: xerneas
texts: Legends say it can share eternal life. It slept for a thousand years in the form of a tree before its revival.

name: yveltal
texts: When this legendary Pokémon’s wings and tail feathers spread wide and glow red, it absorbs the life force of living creatures.

name: zygarde-50
texts: When the Kalos region’s ecosystem falls into disarray, it appears and reveals its secret power.

name: diancie
texts: A sudden transformation of Carbink, its pink, glimmering body is said to be the loveliest sight in the whole world.

name: hoopa
texts: This troublemaker sends anything and everything to faraway places using its loop, which can warp space.

name: volcanion
texts: It lets out billows of steam and disappears into the dense fog. It’s said to live in mountains where humans do not tread.

name: rowlet
texts: This wary Pokémon uses photosynthesis to store up energy during the day, while becoming active at night.

name: dartrix
texts: A bit of a dandy, it spends its free time preening its wings. Its preoccupation with any dirt on its plumage can leave it unable to battle.

name: decidueye
texts: It fires arrow quills from its wings with such precision, they can pierce a pebble at distances over a hundred yards.

name: litten
texts: While grooming itself, it builds up fur inside its stomach. It sets the fur alight and spews fiery attacks, which change based on how it coughs.

name: torracat
texts: At its throat, it bears a bell of fire. The bell rings brightly whenever this Pokémon spits fire.

name: incineroar
texts: This Pokémon has a violent, selfish disposition. If it’s not in the mood to listen, it will ignore its Trainer’s orders with complete nonchalance.

name: popplio
texts: This Pokémon snorts body fluids from its nose, blowing balloons to smash into its foes. It’s famous for being a hard worker.

name: brionne
texts: A skillful dancer, it creates a sequence of water balloons as it dances, and briskly bombards its enemies.

name: primarina
texts: It controls its water balloons with song. The melody is learned from others of its kind and is passed down from one generation to the next.

name: pikipek
texts: It can peck at a rate of 16 times a second to drill holes in trees. It uses the holes for food storage and for nesting.

name: trumbeak
texts: It eats berries and stores their seeds in its beak. When it encounters enemies or prey, it fires off all the seeds in a burst.

name: toucannon
texts: When it battles, its beak heats up. The temperature can easily exceed 212 degrees Fahrenheit, causing severe burns when it hits.

name: yungoos
texts: With its sharp fangs, it will bite anything. It did not originally live in Alola but was imported from another region.

name: gumshoos
texts: When it finds a trace of its prey, it patiently stakes out the location...but it’s always snoozing by nightfall.

name: grubbin
texts: Its strong jaw enables it to scrape trees and slurp out the sap. It normally lives underground.

name: charjabug
texts: Its body is capable of storing electricity. On camping trips, people are grateful to have one around.

name: vikavolt
texts: It zips around, on sharp lookout for an opening. It concentrates electrical energy within its large jaws and uses it to zap its enemies.

name: crabrawler
texts: While guarding its weak points with its pincers, it looks for an opening and unleashes punches. When it loses, it foams at the mouth and faints.

name: crabominable
texts: It aimed for the top but got lost and ended up on a snowy mountain. Being forced to endure the cold, this Pokémon evolved and grew fur.

name: oricorio-baile
texts: It beats its wings together to create fire. As it moves in the steps of its beautiful dance, it bathes opponents in intense flames.

name: cutiefly
texts: It feeds on the nectar and pollen of flowers. Because it’s able to sense auras, it can identify which flowers are about to bloom.

name: ribombee
texts: It rolls up pollen into puffs. It makes many different varieties, some used as food and others used in battle.

name: rockruff
texts: It’s considered to be a good Pokémon for beginners because of its friendliness, but its disposition grows rougher as it grows up.

name: lycanroc-midday
texts: Its quick movements confuse its enemies. Well equipped with claws and fangs, it also uses the sharp rocks in its mane as weapons.

name: wishiwashi-solo
texts: When it’s in trouble, its eyes moisten and begin to shine. The shining light attracts its comrades, and they stand together against their enemies.

name: mareanie
texts: It plunges the poison spike on its head into its prey. When the prey has weakened, Mareanie deals the finishing blow with its 10 tentacles.

name: toxapex
texts: Toxapex crawls along the ocean floor on its 12 legs. It leaves a trail of Corsola bits scattered in its wake.

name: mudbray
texts: The mud stuck to Mudbray’s hooves enhances its grip and its powerful running gait.

name: mudsdale
texts: It spits a mud that provides resistance to both wind and rain, so the walls of old houses were often coated with it.

name: dewpider
texts: It crawls onto the land in search of food. Its water bubble allows it to breathe and protects its soft head.

name: araquanid
texts: It delivers headbutts with the water bubble on its head. Small Pokémon get sucked into the bubble, where they drown.

name: fomantis
texts: During the day, it sleeps and soaks up light. When night falls, it walks around looking for a safer place to sleep.

name: lurantis
texts: It requires a lot of effort to maintain Lurantis’s vivid coloring, but some collectors enjoy this work and treat it as their hobby.

name: morelull
texts: It scatters spores that flicker and glow. Anyone seeing these lights falls into a deep slumber.

name: shiinotic
texts: Forests where Shiinotic live are treacherous to enter at night. People confused by its strange lights can never find their way home again.

name: salandit
texts: It burns its bodily fluids to create a poisonous gas. When its enemies become disoriented from inhaling the gas, it attacks them.

name: salazzle
texts: For some reason, only females have been found. It creates a reverse harem of male Salandit that it lives with.

name: stufful
texts: Despite its adorable appearance, when it gets angry and flails about, its arms and legs could knock a pro wrestler sprawling.

name: bewear
texts: This immensely dangerous Pokémon possesses overwhelming physical strength. Its habitat is generally off-limits.

name: bounsweet
texts: A delectable aroma pours from its body. They are often swallowed whole by Toucannon lured by that wafting deliciousness.

name: steenee
texts: The sepals on its head developed to protect its body. These are quite hard, so even if pecked by bird Pokémon, this Pokémon is totally fine.

name: tsareena
texts: Its long, striking legs aren’t just for show but to be used to kick with skill. In victory, it shows off by kicking the defeated, laughing boisterously.

name: comfey
texts: It attaches flowers to its highly nutritious vine. This revitalizes the flowers, and they give off an aromatic scent.

name: oranguru
texts: Known for its extreme intelligence, this Pokémon will look down on inexperienced Trainers, so it’s best suited to veteran Trainers.

name: passimian
texts: They form groups of roughly 20 individuals. Their mutual bond is remarkable—they will never let down a comrade.

name: wimpod
texts: This Pokémon is a coward. As it desperately dashes off, the flailing of its many legs leaves a sparkling clean path in its wake.

name: golisopod
texts: With a flashing slash of its giant sharp claws, it cleaves seawater—or even air—right in two.

name: sandygast
texts: Born from a sand mound playfully built by a child, this Pokémon embodies the grudges of the departed.

name: palossand
texts: Possessed people controlled by this Pokémon transformed its sand mound into a castle. As it evolved, its power to curse grew ever stronger.

name: pyukumuku
texts: It’s covered in a slime that keeps its skin moist, allowing it to stay on land for days without drying up.

name: type-null
texts: The heavy control mask it wears suppresses its intrinsic capabilities. This Pokémon has some hidden special power.

name: silvally
texts: Its trust in its partner is what awakens it. This Pokémon is capable of changing its type, a flexibility that is well displayed in battle.

name: minior-red-meteor
texts: Originally making its home in the ozone layer, it hurtles to the ground when the shell enclosing its body grows too heavy.

name: komala
texts: It is born asleep, and it dies asleep. All its movements are apparently no more than the results of it tossing and turning in its dreams.

name: turtonator
texts: The shell on its back is chemically unstable and explodes violently if struck. The hole in its stomach is its weak point.

name: togedemaru
texts: The spiny fur on its back is normally at rest. When this Pokémon becomes agitated, its fur stands on end and stabs into its attackers.

name: mimikyu-disguised
texts: Its actual appearance is unknown. A scholar who saw what was under its rag was overwhelmed by terror and died from the shock.

name: bruxish
texts: When it unleashes its psychic power from the protuberance on its head, the grating sound of grinding teeth echoes through the area.

name: drampa
texts: It has a compassionate personality, but if it is angered, it completely destroys its surroundings with its intense breath.

name: dhelmise
texts: Swinging its massive anchor, it can KO Wailord in a single blow. What appears to be green seaweed is actually its body.

name: jangmo-o
texts: It expresses its feelings by smacking its scales. Metallic sounds echo through the tall mountains where Jangmo-o lives.

name: hakamo-o
texts: It leaps at its prey with a courageous shout. Its scaly punches tear its opponents to shreds.

name: kommo-o
texts: When it spots enemies, it threatens them by jingling the scales on its tail. Weak opponents will crack and flee in panic.

name: tapu-koko
texts: This guardian deity of Melemele is brimming with curiosity. It summons thunderclouds and stores their lightning inside its body.

name: tapu-lele
texts: This guardian deity of Akala is guilelessly cruel. The fragrant aroma of flowers is the source of its energy.

name: tapu-bulu
texts: It pulls large trees up by the roots and swings them around. It causes vegetation to grow, and then it absorbs energy from the growth.

name: tapu-fini
texts: The dense fog it creates brings the downfall and destruction of its confused enemies. Ocean currents are the source of its energy.

name: cosmog
texts: Its body is gaseous and frail. It slowly grows as it collects dust from the atmosphere.

name: cosmoem
texts: Motionless as if dead, its body is faintly warm to the touch. In the distant past, it was called the cocoon of the stars.

name: solgaleo
texts: It is said to live in another world. The intense light it radiates from the surface of its body can make the darkest of nights light up like midday.

name: lunala
texts: It is said to be a female evolution of Cosmog. When its third eye activates, away it flies to another world.

name: nihilego
texts: One of several mysterious Ultra Beasts. People on the street report observing those infested by it suddenly becoming violent.

name: buzzwole
texts: This Ultra Beast appeared from another world. It shows off its body, but whether that display is a boast or a threat remains unclear.

name: pheromosa
texts: One of the dangerous Ultra Beasts, it has been spotted running across the land at terrific speeds.

name: xurkitree
texts: One of the mysterious life-forms known as Ultra Beasts. Astonishing electric shocks emanate from its entire body, according to witnesses.

name: celesteela
texts: It appeared from the Ultra Wormhole. Witnesses observed it flying across the sky at high speed.

name: kartana
texts: This Ultra Beast came from the Ultra Wormhole. It seems not to attack enemies on its own, but its sharp body is a dangerous weapon in itself.

name: guzzlord
texts: It has gobbled mountains and swallowed whole buildings, according to reports. It’s one of the Ultra Beasts.

name: necrozma
texts: Reminiscent of the Ultra Beasts, this life-form, apparently asleep underground, is thought to have come from another world in ancient times.

name: magearna
texts: This artificial Pokémon, constructed more than 500 years ago, can understand human speech but cannot itself speak.

name: marshadow
texts: Able to conceal itself in shadows, it never appears before humans, so its very existence was the stuff of myth.

name: poipole
texts: This Ultra Beast is well enough liked to be chosen as a first partner in its own world.

name: naganadel
texts: It stores hundreds of liters of poisonous liquid inside its body. It is one of the organisms known as UBs.

name: stakataka
texts: It appeared from an Ultra Wormhole. Each one appears to be made up of many life-forms stacked one on top of each other.

name: blacephalon
texts: It slithers toward people. Then, without warning, it triggers the explosion of its own head. It’s apparently one kind of Ultra Beast.

name: zeraora
texts: It electrifies its claws and tears its opponents apart with them. Even if they dodge its attack, they’ll be electrocuted by the flying sparks.

name: meltan
texts: It melts particles of iron and other metals found in the subsoil, so it can absorb them into its body of molten steel.

name: melmetal
texts: Revered long ago for its capacity to create iron from nothing, for some reason it has come back to life after 3,000 years.

name: grookey
texts: When it uses its special stick to strike up a beat, the sound waves produced carry revitalizing energy to the plants and flowers in the area.

name: thwackey
texts: The faster a Thwackey can beat out a rhythm with its two sticks, the more respect it wins from its peers.

name: rillaboom
texts: By drumming, it taps into the power of its special tree stump. The roots of the stump follow its direction in battle.

name: scorbunny
texts: A warm-up of running around gets fire energy coursing through this Pokémon’s body. Once that happens, it’s ready to fight at full power.

name: raboot
texts: Its thick and fluffy fur protects it from the cold and enables it to use hotter fire moves.

name: cinderace
texts: It juggles a pebble with its feet, turning it into a burning soccer ball. Its shots strike opponents hard and leave them scorched.

name: sobble
texts: When scared, this Pokémon cries. Its tears pack the chemical punch of 100 onions, and attackers won’t be able to resist weeping.

name: drizzile
texts: A clever combatant, this Pokémon battles using water balloons created with moisture secreted from its palms.

name: inteleon
texts: It has many hidden capabilities, such as fingertips that can shoot water and a membrane on its back that it can use to glide through the air.

name: skwovet
texts: Found throughout the Galar region, this Pokémon becomes uneasy if its cheeks are ever completely empty of berries.

name: greedent
texts: It stashes berries in its tail—so many berries that they fall out constantly. But this Pokémon is a bit slow-witted, so it doesn’t notice the loss.

name: rookidee
texts: It will bravely challenge any opponent, no matter how powerful. This Pokémon benefits from every battle—even a defeat increases its strength a bit.

name: corvisquire
texts: Smart enough to use tools in battle, these Pokémon have been seen picking up rocks and flinging them or using ropes to wrap up enemies.

name: corviknight
texts: This Pokémon reigns supreme in the skies of the Galar region. The black luster of its steel body could drive terror into the heart of any foe.

name: blipbug
texts: A constant collector of information, this Pokémon is very smart. Very strong is what it isn’t.

name: dottler
texts: It barely moves, but it’s still alive. Hiding in its shell without food or water seems to have awakened its psychic powers.

name: orbeetle
texts: It’s famous for its high level of intelligence, and the large size of its brain is proof that it also possesses immense psychic power.

name: nickit
texts: Aided by the soft pads on its feet, it silently raids the food stores of other Pokémon. It survives off its ill-gotten gains.

name: thievul
texts: It secretly marks potential targets with a scent. By following the scent, it stalks its targets and steals from them when they least expect it.

name: gossifleur
texts: It anchors itself in the ground with its single leg, then basks in the sun. After absorbing enough sunlight, its petals spread as it blooms brilliantly.

name: eldegoss
texts: The seeds attached to its cotton fluff are full of nutrients. It spreads them on the wind so that plants and other Pokémon can benefit from them.

name: wooloo
texts: Its curly fleece is such an effective cushion that this Pokémon could fall off a cliff and stand right back up at the bottom, unharmed.

name: dubwool
texts: Weave a carpet from its springy wool, and you end up with something closer to a trampoline. You’ll start to bounce the moment you set foot on it.

name: chewtle
texts: Apparently the itch of its teething impels it to snap its jaws at anything in front of it.

name: drednaw
texts: With jaws that can shear through steel rods, this highly aggressive Pokémon chomps down on its unfortunate prey.

name: yamper
texts: This Pokémon is very popular as a herding dog in the Galar region. As it runs, it generates electricity from the base of its tail.

name: boltund
texts: This Pokémon generates electricity and channels it into its legs to keep them going strong. Boltund can run nonstop for three full days.

name: rolycoly
texts: Most of its body has the same composition as coal. Fittingly, this Pokémon was first discovered in coal mines about 400 years ago.

name: carkol
texts: It forms coal inside its body. Coal dropped by this Pokémon once helped fuel the lives of people in the Galar region.

name: coalossal
texts: It’s usually peaceful, but the vandalism of mines enrages it. Offenders will be incinerated with flames that reach 2,700 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: applin
texts: It spends its entire life inside an apple. It hides from its natural enemies, bird Pokémon, by pretending it’s just an apple and nothing more.

name: flapple
texts: It ate a sour apple, and that induced its evolution. In its cheeks, it stores an acid capable of causing chemical burns.

name: appletun
texts: Eating a sweet apple caused its evolution. A nectarous scent wafts from its body, luring in the bug Pokémon it preys on.

name: silicobra
texts: As it digs, it swallows sand and stores it in its neck pouch. The pouch can hold more than 17 pounds of sand.

name: sandaconda
texts: When it contracts its body, over 220 pounds of sand sprays from its nose. If it ever runs out of sand, it becomes disheartened.

name: cramorant
texts: It’s so strong that it can knock out some opponents in a single hit, but it also may forget what it’s battling midfight.

name: arrokuda
texts: If it sees any movement around it, this Pokémon charges for it straightaway, leading with its sharply pointed jaw. It’s very proud of that jaw.

name: barraskewda
texts: This Pokémon has a jaw that’s as sharp as a spear and as strong as steel. Apparently Barraskewda’s flesh is surprisingly tasty, too.

name: toxel
texts: It stores poison in an internal poison sac and secretes that poison through its skin. If you touch this Pokémon, a tingling sensation follows.

name: toxtricity-amped
texts: When this Pokémon sounds as if it’s strumming a guitar, it’s actually clawing at the protrusions on its chest to generate electricity.

name: sizzlipede
texts: It stores flammable gas in its body and uses it to generate heat. The yellow sections on its belly get particularly hot.

name: centiskorch
texts: When it heats up, its body temperature reaches about 1,500 degrees Fahrenheit. It lashes its body like a whip and launches itself at enemies.

name: clobbopus
texts: It’s very curious, but its means of investigating things is to try to punch them with its tentacles. The search for food is what brings it onto land.

name: grapploct
texts: A body made up of nothing but muscle makes the grappling moves this Pokémon performs with its tentacles tremendously powerful.

name: sinistea
texts: This Pokémon is said to have been born when a lonely spirit possessed a cold, leftover cup of tea.

name: polteageist
texts: This species lives in antique teapots. Most pots are forgeries, but on rare occasions, an authentic work is found.

name: hatenna
texts: Via the protrusion on its head, it senses other creatures’ emotions. If you don’t have a calm disposition, it will never warm up to you.

name: hattrem
texts: No matter who you are, if you bring strong emotions near this Pokémon, it will silence you violently.

name: hatterene
texts: It emits psychic power strong enough to cause headaches as a deterrent to the approach of others.

name: impidimp
texts: Through its nose, it sucks in the emanations produced by people and Pokémon when they feel annoyed. It thrives off this negative energy.

name: morgrem
texts: When it gets down on all fours as if to beg for forgiveness, it’s trying to lure opponents in so that it can stab them with its spear-like hair.

name: grimmsnarl
texts: With the hair wrapped around its body helping to enhance its muscles, this Pokémon can overwhelm even Machamp.

name: obstagoon
texts: Its voice is staggering in volume. Obstagoon has a tendency to take on a threatening posture and shout—this move is known as Obstruct.

name: perrserker
texts: What appears to be an iron helmet is actually hardened hair. This Pokémon lives for the thrill of battle.

name: cursola
texts: Its shell is overflowing with its heightened otherworldly energy. The ectoplasm serves as protection for this Pokémon’s core spirit.

name: sirfetchd
texts: Only Farfetch’d that have survived many battles can attain this evolution. When this Pokémon’s leek withers, it will retire from combat.

name: mr-rime
texts: It’s highly skilled at tap-dancing. It waves its cane of ice in time with its graceful movements.

name: runerigus
texts: A powerful curse was woven into an ancient painting. After absorbing the spirit of a Yamask, the painting began to move.

name: milcery
texts: This Pokémon was born from sweet-smelling particles in the air. Its body is made of cream.

name: alcremie
texts: When it trusts a Trainer, it will treat them to berries it’s decorated with cream.

name: falinks
texts: Five of them are troopers, and one is the brass. The brass’s orders are absolute.

name: pincurchin
texts: It feeds on seaweed, using its teeth to scrape it off rocks. Electric current flows from the tips of its spines.

name: snom
texts: It spits out thread imbued with a frigid sort of energy and uses it to tie its body to branches, disguising itself as an icicle while it sleeps.

name: frosmoth
texts: Icy scales fall from its wings like snow as it flies over fields and mountains. The temperature of its wings is less than −290 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: stonjourner
texts: It stands in grasslands, watching the sun’s descent from zenith to horizon. This Pokémon has a talent for delivering dynamic kicks.

name: eiscue-ice
texts: It drifted in on the flow of ocean waters from a frigid place. It keeps its head iced constantly to make sure it stays nice and cold.

name: indeedee-male
texts: It uses the horns on its head to sense the emotions of others. Males will act as valets for those they serve, looking after their every need.

name: morpeko-full-belly
texts: As it eats the seeds stored up in its pocket-like pouches, this Pokémon is not just satisfying its constant hunger. It’s also generating electricity.

name: cufant
texts: It digs up the ground with its trunk. It’s also very strong, being able to carry loads of over five tons without any problem at all.

name: copperajah
texts: They came over from another region long ago and worked together with humans. Their green skin is resistant to water.

name: dracozolt
texts: In ancient times, it was unbeatable thanks to its powerful lower body, but it went extinct anyway after it depleted all its plant-based food sources.

name: arctozolt
texts: The shaking of its freezing upper half is what generates its electricity. It has a hard time walking around.

name: dracovish
texts: Powerful legs and jaws made it the apex predator of its time. Its own overhunting of its prey was what drove it to extinction.

name: arctovish
texts: Though it’s able to capture prey by freezing its surroundings, it has trouble eating the prey afterward because its mouth is on top of its head.

name: duraludon
texts: Its body resembles polished metal, and it’s both lightweight and strong. The only drawback is that it rusts easily.

name: dreepy
texts: After being reborn as a ghost Pokémon, Dreepy wanders the areas it used to inhabit back when it was alive in prehistoric seas.

name: drakloak
texts: It’s capable of flying faster than 120 mph. It battles alongside Dreepy and dotes on them until they successfully evolve.

name: dragapult
texts: When it isn’t battling, it keeps Dreepy in the holes on its horns. Once a fight starts, it launches the Dreepy like supersonic missiles.

name: zacian
texts: Known as a legendary hero, this Pokémon absorbs metal particles, transforming them into a weapon it uses to battle.

name: zamazenta
texts: In times past, it worked together with a king of the people to save the Galar region. It absorbs metal that it then uses in battle.

name: eternatus
texts: The core on its chest absorbs energy emanating from the lands of the Galar region. This energy is what allows Eternatus to stay active.

name: kubfu
texts: Kubfu trains hard to perfect its moves. The moves it masters will determine which form it takes when it evolves.

name: urshifu-single-strike
texts: This form of Urshifu is a strong believer in the one-hit KO. Its strategy is to leap in close to foes and land a devastating blow with a hardened fist.

name: zarude
texts: Within dense forests, this Pokémon lives in a pack with others of its kind. It’s incredibly aggressive, and the other Pokémon of the forest fear it.

name: regieleki
texts: This Pokémon is a cluster of electrical energy. It’s said that removing the rings on Regieleki’s body will unleash the Pokémon’s latent power.

name: regidrago
texts: An academic theory proposes that Regidrago’s arms were once the head of an ancient dragon Pokémon. The theory remains unproven.

name: glastrier
texts: Glastrier emits intense cold from its hooves. It’s also a belligerent Pokémon—anything it wants, it takes by force.

name: spectrier
texts: It probes its surroundings with all its senses save one—it doesn’t use its sense of sight. Spectrier’s kicks are said to separate soul from body.

name: calyrex
texts: Calyrex is a merciful Pokémon, capable of providing healing and blessings. It reigned over the Galar region in times of yore.

name: wyrdeer
texts: The black orbs shine with an uncanny light when the Pokémon is erecting invisible barriers. The fur shed from its beard retains heat well and is a highly useful material for winter clothing.

name: kleavor
texts: A violent creature that fells towering trees with its crude axes and shields itself with hard stone. If one should chance upon this Pokémon in the wilds, one's only recourse is to flee.

name: ursaluna
texts: I believe it was Hisui's swampy terrain that gave Ursaluna its burly physique and newfound capacity to manipulate peat at will.

name: basculegion-male
texts: Clads itself in the souls of comrades that perished before fulfilling their goals of journeying upstream. No other species throughout all Hisui's rivers is Basculegion's equal.

name: sneasler
texts: Because of Sneasler's virulent poison and daunting physical prowess, no other species could hope to best it on the frozen highlands. Preferring solitude, this species does not form packs.

name: overqwil
texts: Its lancelike spikes and savage temperament have earned it the nickname ”sea fiend.” It slurps up poison to nourish itself.

name: enamorus-incarnate
texts: When it flies to this land from across the sea, the bitter winter comes to an end. According to legend, this Pokémon's love gives rise to the budding of fresh life across Hisui.

name: sprigatito
texts: This pokemon is so rare that it hasn't been well documented aside from few photos.
